definition: transliteration (rendering phonetic value, e.g. of English words in Chinese characters)/characters giving phonetic value of Chinese word or name (when the correct characters may be unknown)/transcription (linguistics)/to transcribe phonetic symbols
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
